startLaunch.testBotMessage: Click 'Test Now' to launch the bot in test mode before launching. Once you are satisfied with the bot, you can launch your bot for your website
startLaunch.testMessage: Click 'Test Now' to launch your bot for Testing.
startLaunch.typeYourMessage: Type your message here and hit enter...
startLaunch.stopBotMessage: Do you want to stop the bot?
startLaunch.reInitBotMessage: Do you want to re-initialize/re-start the bot?
startLaunch.launchBotMessage: Do you want to launch the bot to production? By doing so the bot will be available for customers to use on the internet

launched.botUniqueIdUse: When you configure the chatbot on your website, use the below bot unique id in the bot configuration.

test.botLaunchedForTesting: Your bot has been launched for testing.
test.message: Test your bot using the below chat client. If you are satisfied with the Bot, you can launch the bot by clicking the 'Launch Now' button.
